name: DGCP | MaMeeFarm™ — Proof 416 Soil Sweeping and Fertilizer Reuse
description:
This NFT represents Proof 416 from MaMeeFarm™, recorded on 2025-12-31
under the DGCP (Data Governance & Continuous Proof) framework.

The record documents the activity of sweeping residual duck manure from
the ground of an empty duck coop and reusing it as fertilizer for vegetable
plots. Although the coop is currently without ducks, the physical traces
of past life remain and are reintegrated into the farm’s nutrient cycle.

This activity reflects circular resource use, continuity of labor, and
evidence-based documentation of real agricultural work, even in the
absence of active livestock.

Observed details:
- Activity: Sweeping duck manure residue for fertilizer use
- Location: Empty duck coop area
- Time recorded: 07:28 AM
- Date: 2025-12-31
- Purpose: Soil enrichment for vegetables

This proof preserves ground-truth agricultural labor as it occurs,
forming part of a non-retroactive, verifiable DGCP evidence chain.

Location: MaMeeFarm™, Thailand
System: DGCP (Data Governance & Continuous Proof)

DGCP | MMFARM-POL-2025
